name: Journey To Destiny
description:
• You have been selected by your secret organization to go on a mission. Transferred to your new HQ, just like your partner, you will find documents on your base that will help you identify the places where the energy stones are hidden. But beware, trials await you there. Will you be able to overcome them?



    • To complete your mission, you need to collect documents that will allow you to set up your teleporter to various locations you will have visit. You will travel in time, analyse the obstacles on your way, solve puzzles and discover their stories. At the end of this journey and your mission will be a success and you will bring back the object wanted by your secret organization: the energy stone. Will you succeed in your mission?



    • In Journey To Destiny, you can choose your adventure playing either Kaydyn or Craith. As soon as you enter the HQ, you will find detailed documents on a computer, informations about the different places and the necessary parameters to be configured on the monitor connected to the teleporter. It will allow you to reach your chosen location, solve puzzles in order to progress through the game and find the energy stone that will be the final goal before returning to the base.



    Notes:


    • Choose the adventure you want to do with your partner..

    • These worlds can only be explored with someone. Choose a partner to explore them..

    • Communication and analysis are the two key words to progress during your journey..

    Updates:


    • Updates are planned for the future with new maps and chapters!

    Enjoy your adventure.
